pullrequest.title: updated run/stop button disabled status based on srcsim state

content.raw: You mean, the actual stop , it should be quick , assuming the process does not hang out in the instance. Do you know if the instance is trying to stop ? You can check that by looking at the specific cloudsim-sim:4000/api /simulations rest api .
content.html: You mean, the actual stop , it should be quick , assuming the process does not hang out in the instance. Do you know if the instance is trying to stop ? You can check that by looking at the specific cloudsim-sim:4000/api /simulations rest api .
